title: installing
body: i did a system restore on my computer and tried installing league of legends. on google chrome when i download the installer doesnt even open and on internet explorer the installer opens but when i click in stall (the 2nd to last step) it always says are you sure you want to cancel the install. then it becomes a constant loop

replies.body: This sounds like a peculiar issue, but I'd like to help find a ix for this!  First and foremost, make sure that you're [downloading ](https://signup.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/signup/redownload)league from the main site, and not through any external sources.  I also suggest using the  [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752674-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs) to help with performing a clean reinstall.  It will be automatic and do most of the heavy lifting.  I hope that helps!
thanks the hextech repair tool helped alot
